name: Turkey Meal
desc: Turkey Meal is produced from fresh turkey by-products or carcass obtained in slaughterhouses. Skin, feathers, feet, heads, and bones are collected from turkeys slaughtered for human consumption. The raw material is later heated, cooked, dried, pressed, and finely ground.
techs: Turkey Meal is an excellent source of highly digestible and palatable protein for domestic animals. It has around 60% protein content and around 13% of fat. The Turkey Meal product also contains vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants as well as riboflavin responsible for enhanced absorption of nutrients. The final product is a homogenous, light brown meal.
shelf: The shelf life of Turkey Meal is 8-12 weeks.
packaging: Foodcom supplies its Business Partners with Turkey Meal in bulk or Big bags.
applications: Turkey meal is used as an ingredient of premixes in pet food products.
